message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  Could you do $13,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $13,000 is too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. Can you consider that?
